casebody.data:
HAMBY
v.
PROFILE PRODUCTS, et al. No. 507A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 15, 2007. Joseph W. Moss, Charlotte, Burley B. Mitchell, Jr., Sarah L. Buthe, Raleigh, for Profile Products. Gregory C. York, Charlotte, for Electric Service Group, Inc. William H. Sturges, H. Bryan Ives, III, Charlotte, William G. Scoggin, Raleigh, for NCCBI and NCAI. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of February 2007 by Plaintiffs for Extension of Time to File Brief: "Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Hamby) shall have up to and including the 2nd day of March 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of February 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
